Joe Biden: s incorrect reference to the locations of the massacres in El Paso, Texas, and Dayton, Ohio, as "Houston" and "Michigan" during a speech at a fundraiser in San Diego, California on August 4, 2019.
The eyewitness account of the gaffe by S: Tribune reporter Lyndsay Winkley, who personally heard Biden make the mistake during the speech.
Biden: s self-correction of his mistake about two minutes later, acknowledging that he had mistakenly referred to Dayton as "Michigan."
The verification of the incident by Snop: based on the fact that it was witnessed and verified by a reporter on assignment, leading them to rate it as "true."
